Translations.Text: Tiandi jian you xuduo jixiang, tamen cong pangbian zouguo er bu zhuyi.
Tamen da duoshu ren shi zai bai ouxiang de qingkuang xia cai xinyang an la de.
Nandao tamen bupa an la de xingfa zhong shibukedang de zainan jianglin tamen, huo fuhuo de shijian zai tamen buzhi bu jue shi turan jianglin tamen ma?
Ni shuo:“Zhe shi wo de dao [zhu]: Wo he zhuisui wo de ren dou yi zhenzhi er qiqiu an la. Zanmei an la chaojue! Wo bushi bai ouxiang zhe.”

Fanshi wo zai ni zhiqian cong ge chengshi de renmin zhong suo paiqian de shizhe, wo du qishi tamen. Nandao tamen meiyou zai dadishang luxing, guancha tamen de qian ren de jieju ruhe ma? Dui jingwei zhe, houshi de zhuzhai cai shi zui hao de. Nandao nimen hai bumingli ma?

[Tamen bei zhanhuan chengfa], zhidao shizhemen juewang, renwei ziji que yi bei fouren shi, wo de yuanzhu cai jianglin tamen,[na shi] wo jiang zhengjiu wo suo yiyu zhe. Wo dui fanzui de minzhong de chengfa shi buke kangju de.

Zai tamen de gushi zhong, dui you lizhi de renmen que youyi zhong jiaoxun [zhu]. Zhe [“gulanjing”] bushi weizao de yanci, ta neng zhengshi zai ci zhiqian [jiang shi] de jingdian [ru “tao la te” he “yin ji lei” deng], chanming wanshi wanwu, shi dui xinyang de minzhong de yindao he ci min.
